message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which we believe is worth more than $120 to you. Considering its quality and unique features, I propose a price of $150 for it. I understand that value is subjective, but I assure you that this product will exceed your expectations. Let me know if you're interested in discussing further or making an offer.

I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I'm looking to save some money. Considering its value, I'm willing to pay $120 for it. I believe this is a fair price considering its features and quality. Let me know if you're willing to consider my offer.
